title: PLEASE CHANGE THE GAME BACK TO THE WAY IT WAS ITS NOT A FUN GAME ANYMORE
body: CAN WE HAVE 2 DIFFERENT LEAGUE OF LEGENDS. 1 OLD SCHOOL. 1 NEW SCHOOL. SO THE SKILLED PLAYERS CAN GO BACK TO OLD SCHOOL WHILE THE REST CAN GO FARM MINIONS WITH OP TOWERS NO SKILL REQUIRED TO HUG AND FARM

replies.body: I swear you make a new thread like 3 times a week whinging about something... just stop playing.
I'm allowed to be heard by the league community if you don't like it ignore it you don't have to post why did you post
You see for no reason but to be rude and have a dig at me lmao you must be bored

The old devs are gone, the new order cannot be stopped.
The new order: snowballing, 1st 10 mins deciding the whole game, early game dmg insane, silly amounts of CC and overstuffed kits
